column1: Table 6-65:  IPCC Approach 1 Quantitative Uncertainty Estimates for C Stock Changes and CH4 Emissions occurring within Vegetated Coastal Wetlands Remaining Vegetated Coastal Wetlands in 2019 (MMT CO2 Eq. and Percent)
